variables.name: NEE_annual
description: Annual net ecosystem exchange of CO2 between ecosystem, commonly measured using eddy-covariance. Sign convention: negative indicates C uptake
notes: *Equation assumes minimal vertical advection, respiration-derived dissolved inorganic carbon, and non-repiratory CO2 fluxes (e.g., from fire or ultraviolet oxidation of organic matter); see Chapin et al. 2006

variables.name: NEP_annual
description: Net ecosystem production estimated biometrically / from ground-based measurements

variables.name: GPP_C_annual
description: Annual gross primary production, commonly estimated through flux partitioning of eddy covariance. A.k.a. "Gross Ecosystem Production".
equations: (1)* GPP_annual = Reco_annual - NEE_annual; (2)** GPP_annual = NPP_5 + R_auto_annual
notes: *Equation 1 assumes minimal vertical advection, respiration-derived dissolved inorganic carbon, and non-repiratory CO2 fluxes (e.g., from fire or ultraviolet oxidation of organic matter); see Chapin et al. 2006. **Equation 2 assumes no net change in non-structural carbohydrate storage.

variables.name: TBCF
description: Total belowground C flux (through roots)

variables.name: NPP_1
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, and fine root.
equations: NPP_1= ANPP_foliage + (ANPP_stem + ANPP_branch) + BNPP_coarse root + BNPP_fine root

variables.name: NPP_1_C
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, and fine root.
equations: NPP_1_C= ANPP_foliage_C + (ANPP_stem_C + ANPP_branch_C) + BNPP_coarse root_C + BNPP_fine root_C

variables.name: NPP_2
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, and understory.

variables.name: NPP_2_C
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, and understory.

variables.name: NPP_3
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory and reproductive NPP.

variables.name: NPP_3_C
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory and reproductive NPP.

variables.name: NPP_4
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive and herbivory.

variables.name: NPP_4_C
description: NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive and herbivory.

variables.name: NPP_5
description: Total NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive, herbivory, VOC and exudation.

variables.name: NPP_5_C
description: Total NPP, including foliage, branch, stem, coarse root, fine root, understory, reproductive, herbivory, VOC and exudation.

variables.name: NPP_understory
description: Total understory NPP. Components included may vary.

variables.name: NPP_understory_C
description: Total understory NPP. Components included may vary.

variables.name: ANPP
description: Annual aboveground NPP, where components included are unknown/do not fit the definition of ANPP_1 / ANPP_2

variables.name: ANPP_C
description: Annual aboveground NPP, where components included are unknown/do not fit the definition of ANPP_1 / ANPP_2

variables.name: ANPP_1
description: Annual aboveground NPP, including foliage and stem growth

variables.name: ANPP_1_C
description: Annual aboveground NPP, including foliage and stem growth

variables.name: ANPP_2
description: Annual aboveground NPP, including foliage, stem growth, and branch turnover
equations: (1) ANPP_2 = ANPP_foliage + ANPP_stem + ANPP_branch; (2) ANPP_2 = ANPP_foliage + ANPP_woody

variables.name: ANPP_2_C
description: Annual aboveground NPP, including foliage, stem growth, and branch turnover
equations: (1) ANPP_2_C = ANPP_foliage_C + ANPP_stem_C + ANPP_branch_C; (2) ANPP_2_C = ANPP_foliage_C + ANPP_woody_C

variables.name: ANPP_foliage
description: Annual foliage production, typically estimated by collecting leaf/needle fall throughout the year, but correcting for changes in leaf biomass when measured.
equations: ANPP_foliage = (total leaf production) - ANPP_folivory + (change in Biomass_foliage)
notes: If there is any net change in foliage biomass during the measurement period, ANPP_foliage estimates based on leaf fall that do not correct for changes in foliage biomass do not accurately represent C allocation to foliage production. Note also that unless methods correct for consumption of foliage by herbivores, this measurement excludes leaf production that is consumed by herbivores.

variables.name: ANPP_foliage_C
description: Annual foliage production, typically estimated by collecting leaf/needle fall throughout the year, but correcting for changes in leaf biomass when measured.
equations: ANPP_foliage_C = (total leaf production) - ANPP_folivory_C + (change in C_foliage)
notes: If there is any net change in foliage biomass during the measurement period, ANPP_foliage estimates based on leaf fall that do not correct for changes in foliage biomass do not accurately represent C allocation to foliage production. Note also that unless methods correct for consumption of foliage by herbivores, this measurement excludes leaf production that is consumed by herbivores.

variables.name: ANPP_litterfall_1
description: Anuall litterfall, including leaves, twigs, and reproductive structures

variables.name: ANPP_litterfall_1_C
description: Anuall litterfall, including leaves, twigs, and reproductive structures

variables.name: ANPP_litterfall_2
description: Annual litterfall, including leaves, twigs, reproductive structures, and small branches/ wood/ large twigs (e.g. "woody material", twigs <3.5cm dbh)
equations: ANPP_litterfall_2 = ANPP_litterfall_1 + ( ANPP_small branches/ large twigs)

variables.name: ANPP_litterfall_2_C
description: Annual litterfall, including leaves, twigs, reproductive structures, and small branches/ wood/ large twigs (e.g. "woody material", twigs <3.5cm dbh)
equations: ANPP_litterfall_2_C = ANPP_litterfall_1_C + ( ANPP_small branches/ large twigs_C)

variables.name: ANPP_litterfall_3
description: Annual litterfall, methods not specified.

variables.name: ANPP_litterfall_3_C
description: Annual litterfall, methods not specified.

variables.name: ANPP_stem
description: Annual stem ANPP; i.e., annual wood (including branch) increment determined using allometric equations relating aboveground woody biomass increment to changes in stem diameter of all individual trees in the plot

variables.name: ANPP_stem_C
description: Annual stem ANPP; i.e., annual wood (including branch) increment determined using allometric equations relating aboveground woody biomass increment to changes in stem diameter of all individual trees in the plot

variables.name: ANPP_branch
description: Annual branch turnover, typically determined by collecting branch fall throughout the year.

variables.name: ANPP_branch_C
description: Annual branch turnover, typically determined by collecting branch fall throughout the year.

variables.name: ANPP_woody
description: Annual aboveground woody production, including stem growth and branch turnover

variables.name: ANPP_woody_C
description: Annual aboveground woody production, including stem growth and branch turnover

variables.name: ANPP_repro
description: Annual allocation of NPP to reproductive structures (fruits, flowers, seeds)

variables.name: ANPP_repro_C
description: Annual allocation of NPP to reproductive structures (fruits, flowers, seeds)

variables.name: ANPP_folivory
description: Annual leaf consumption by herbivores, defined here as a direct component of ANPP (as opposed to a component of ANPP_foliage)*.
equations: ANPP_folivory = (total leaf production) - ANPP_foliage + (change in Biomass_foliage)
notes: *We define ANPP_folivory as a direct component of ANPP (as opposed to a component of ANPP_foliage) because common measurement methods of ANPP_foliage do not account for ANPP_folivory.

variables.name: ANPP_folivory_C
description: Annual leaf consumption by herbivores, defined here as a direct component of ANPP_C (as opposed to a component of ANPP_foliage_C)*.
equations: ANPP_folivory_C = (total leaf production) - ANPP_foliage_C + (change in C_foliage)
notes: *We define ANPP_folivory_C as a direct component of ANPP_C (as opposed to a component of ANPP_foliage_C) because common measurement methods of ANPP_foliage_C do not account for ANPP_folivory_C.

variables.name: BNPP_root
description: Annual root biomass production determined by repeated soil coring, isotopic estimates of fine-root turnover combined with biomass measurements, root ingrowth cores, root ingrowth mesh, upscaled root-length production observed in minirhizotrons or the soil respiration and litterfall constraint formulated by Raich & Nadelhoffer (1989)

variables.name: BNPP_root_C
description: Annual root production determined by repeated soil coring, isotopic estimates of fine-root turnover combined with biomass measurements, root ingrowth cores, root ingrowth mesh, upscaled root-length production observed in minirhizotrons or the soil respiration and litterfall constraint formulated by Raich & Nadelhoffer (1989)

variables.name: BNPP_coarse root
description: Annual coarse root production, typically determined using allometric equations relating root mass to stem diameter.

variables.name: BNPP_coarse root_C
description: Annual coarse root production, typically determined using allometric equations relating root mass to stem diameter.

variables.name: BNPP_fine root
description: Annual fine root production, estimated using a variety of methods including minirhizotrons, repeat coring, and ingrowth cores.

variables.name: BNPP_fine root_C
description: Annual fine root production, estimated using a variety of methods including minirhizotrons, repeat coring, and ingrowth cores.

variables.name: Reco_annual
description: Annual ecosystem respiration,commonly estimated through flux partitioning of eddy covariance. Sign convention: positive.
equations: (1)* Reco_annual = NEE_annual - GPP_annual; (2) Reco_annual = R_auto_annual + R_het_annual
notes: *Equation 1 assumes minimal vertical advection, respiration-derived dissolved inorganic carbon, and non-repiratory CO2 fluxes (e.g., from fire or ultraviolet oxidation of organic matter); see Chapin et al. 2006

variables.name: R_foliage_annual
description: Annual foliar respiration

variables.name: R_wood_annual
description: Annual aboveground respiration of woody stems

variables.name: R_ag_annual
description: Annual aboveground autotrophic respiration

variables.name: R_auto_annual
description: Annual autotrophic respiration, including above- and belowground components.

variables.name: R_het_annual
description: Annual hetrotrophic respiration, including above- and belowground components.

variables.name: Rsoil_annual
description: Annual soil respiration

variables.name: Rsoil_het_annual
description: Annual heterotrophic soil respiration

variables.name: Rroot_fine_annual
description: Annual fine root respiration

variables.name: Woody_mortality
description: Annual biomass mortality--i.e., total biomass of trees that die, or movement of biomass from Biomass_total to Deadwood.

variables.name: Woody_mortality_C
description: Annual carbon flux from C_Biomass_total to C_Deadwood--i.e., total carbon in trees that die.

variables.name: Ecosystem_2
description: Total ecosystem organic matter, including total biomass, deadwood, and organic layer but excluding soil organic matter.

variables.name: Ecosystem_2_C
description: Total ecosystem carbon in organic matter, including total biomass, deadwood, and organic layer but excluding soil organic carbon.

variables.name: Biomass_total
description: Total live biomass.
equations: (1) Biomass_total = Biomass_ag + Biomass_root_total; (2) Biomass_total= Biomass_structural + Biomass_foliage + Biomass_root_fine

variables.name: C_biomass_total
description: Total carbon in live biomass.
equations: (1) C_biomass_total = C_ag + C_root_total; (2) C_biomass_total= C_structural + C_foliage + C_root_fine

variables.name: Biomass_structural
description: Total structural biomass--i.e., stems and coarse roots. Excludes fine roots and foliage.
equations: (1) Biomass_structural = Biomass_total - Biomass_foliage - Biomass_root_fine; (2) Biomass_structural = Biomass_ags + Biomass_root_coarse

variables.name: C_structural
description: Total carbon in structural biomass--i.e., stems and coarse roots. Excludes fine roots and foliage.
equations: (1) C_structural = C_biomass_total - C_foliage - C_root_fine; (2) C_structural = C_ags + C_root_coarse

variables.name: Biomass_foliage
description: Total foliage biomass

variables.name: C_foliage
description: Total carbon in foliage biomass

variables.name: Biomass_ags
description: Total aboveground structural (stem + branch) biomass

variables.name: C_ags
description: Total carbon in aboveground structural (stem + branch) biomass

variables.name: Biomass_ag
description: Total aboveground live biomass. May include biomass of reproductive structures and understory biomass, if data are available. Dead wood excluded.

variables.name: C_ag
description: Total carbon in aboveground live biomass. May include biomass of reproductive structures and understory biomass, if data are available. Dead wood excluded.

variables.name: Biomass_root_fine
description: Total fine root biomass. Typical size cutoff (root_diameter_max) is 1-2 mm diameter, with preference given to root_diameter_max = 1 mm when there is an option.

variables.name: C_root_fine
description: Total carbon in fine root biomass. Typical size cutoff (root_diameter_max) is 1-2 mm diameter, with preference given to root_diameter_max = 1 mm when there is an option.

variables.name: Biomass_root_coarse
description: Total coarse root biomass. Typical size cutoff (root_diameter_min) is 1-2 mm diameter, with preference given to root_diameter_min = 1 mm when there is an option.

variables.name: C_root_coarse
description: Total carbon in coarse root biomass. Typical size cutoff (root_diameter_min) is 1-2 mm diameter, with preference given to root_diameter_min = 1 mm when there is an option.

variables.name: Biomass_root_total
description: Total root biomass

variables.name: C_root_total
description: Total carbon in root biomass

variables.name: Deadwood
description: Total mass of dead wood, including standing dead wood and coarse woody debris

variables.name: C_deadwood
description: Total carbon in dead wood, including standing dead wood and coarse woody debris

variables.name: Downdeadwood
description: Total mass of downed dead wood (coarse woody debris)

variables.name: C_Downdeadwood
description: Total carbon in downed dead wood (coarse woody debris)

variables.name: Standingdeadwood
description: Total mass of standing dead wood (snags)

variables.name: C_Sdeadwood
description: Total carbon in standing dead wood (snags)

variables.name: Organic layer
description: Mass of litter/ organic layer/ forest floor

variables.name: C_organic layer
description: Carbon in litter/ organic layer/ forest floor

variables.name: SOM
description: Soil organic matter to specified depth in mineral soil

variables.name: SOC
description: Soil organic carbon to specified depth in mineral soil

variables.name: LAI
description: LAI: leaf area index (m2/m2)

variables.name: leafCa
description: Foliar calcium concentration

variables.name: leafK
description: Foliar K concentration

variables.name: leafMg
description: Foliar magnesium concentration

variables.name: leafN
description: Leaf Percent Nitrogen

variables.name: leafP
description: Foliar P concentration

variables.name: rootN
description: Percent N in belowground live tissue

variables.name: soilC
description: Soil carbon content

variables.name: stemN
description: Nitrogen in stem

variables.name: airT
description: Air temperature (also a secondary variable)

variables.name: branch_diameter_max
description: Maximum branch diameter

variables.name: branch_diameter_min
description: Minimum branch diameter

variables.name: depth
description: Depth to which measurement was taken

variables.name: growing season length
description: Growing season length

variables.name: max_diameter
description: Maximum diameter of tree part being measured (stem, woody debris)

variables.name: min_dbh
description: Minimum diameter at breast height

variables.name: min_diameter
description: Minimum diameter of tree part being measured (stem, woody debris)

variables.name: min_height
description: Minimum height

variables.name: min_length
description: Minimum length

variables.name: root_diameter_max
description: Maximum root diameter

variables.name: root_diameter_min
description: Minimum root diameter

variables.name: twig_diameter_max
description: Maximum twig diameter

variables.name: soilT
description: Soil temperature (also a secondary variable)

variables.name: u*
description: Friction velocity

variables.name: allometric_equation
description: Allometric equation codes defined in TropForC_allometry.csv
